turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, whats on your mind today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order pizza from Bella Luna. Can you help me out with that, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pizza from Bella Luna sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizza would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order four pizzas, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4, sure what size will your pizza be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large, all four of them large, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 large pizzas, sure, what are your choice of toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get one supreme pizza with everything on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second one, can I get a cheese pizza? The third, can I get a Meat Lovers, extra bacon? And the fourth, can I get a veggie-only pizza, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 supreme with everything, 1 with cheese, 1 with meat lovers with extra bacon, and 1 veggie only is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any other special instruction?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get thick crust on all four pizzas, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thick crust on all 4 sure noted.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And that's about it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, let me get your total for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your total comes to 96 dollars, shall we go ahead and get them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcome, enjoy your pizza.
